adminSpace.title: Admin Space
adminSpace.description: Manage schedules, track students and teachers, control billing and access detailed reports.

teacherSpace.title: Teacher Space
teacherSpace.description: Access your classes, enter grades, share resources and communicate easily with your students and their parents.

parentSpace.title: Parent Space
parentSpace.description: Access grades, absences and schedules, view invoices, communicate with teachers.

studentSpace.title: Student Space
studentSpace.description: View your courses, schedule, results and stay connected to your school through a simple and intuitive interface.
